title: Hi! I‚Äôm Rick!
text:
Hi! My full name is Henrique Shiguemoto Felizardo. I have a bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science from State University of Maring√°, with more than 2 years of professional experience in Data Analysis. I‚Äôm also passionate about Human-Computer Interaction, Design, Software Engineering, and Game Development.
You can download my CV (English) or CV (Portuguese).
I am dedicated to applying data, technology, and design to create impactful solutions that drive meaningful results. With a versatile skill set spanning analysis, development, and visualization, I aim to deliver insights and solutions that make a tangible difference.

title: Projects
text:
üìà Data Analysis




DATASUS Mortality Dashboard


Research prototype exploring Brazilian SUS mortality data with interactive visual narratives.



Designed filters and views by cause, region, and time


Engineered data cleaning to handle public dataset edge cases



Tech: R, Shiny, ggplot2


Open dashboard | More details





Tableau Data Visualizations


Tableau dashboards built from public datasets, focusing on clear KPIs and comprehension.



Rapid EDA to identify the most relevant metrics


Single-view dashboards to support cohesive storytelling



Tech: Tableau, SQL, Excel


Tableau Public gallery | More details





HCI-Guided Dashboard Development


HCI techniques applied to a dashboard using open COVID-19 data for Maring√°.



Ran user research and translated findings into UI/UX requirements


Built an interactive prototype aligned to HCI best practices



Tech: R, Shiny, ggplot2, HCI methods


Private Repo | More details

title: Projects
text:
üíª Software Engineering




BipaNota (Barcode Verification App)


App for retailers to speed up goods verification against fiscal notes via barcode scanning.



Implemented camera-based scanning and product matching logic


Led development and testing for internal Google Play pilots



Tech: Flutter, Dart


Closed testing ¬∑ work in progress | More details





Stelf (Game Store Prototype)


University team project inspired by Steam; end-to-end desktop app with catalog and persistence.



Scrum-style development with a 4-student team over ~3 months


WinForms UI and MongoDB backend integration



Tech: C#, WinForms, MongoDB, Visual Studio


Github Repo | More details





Gesture Recognition for Health IS


Research using Leap Motion to replace touch-based input in a web Health Information System.



Gesture mapping to web navigation with Selenium automation


Presented results at EAITI 2022 and CBIS 2022



Tech: Java, Selenium, Leap Motion


Private Repo | More details

title: Projects

QuickJelly


First 2D game‚Äîcollect fruits, dodge enemies, beat the timer.



Learned 2D gameplay, physics, audio, rendering, and design



Tech: Unity, C#, Visual Studio


Gameplay video | More details





QuickFlower


Engine-less 2D survival game‚Äîavoid bees and survive 15 seconds per level.



Implemented bitmap loading, audio, CPU-side rasterization, and SIMD



Tech: C, Win32 API, Visual Studio


Gameplay video | More details

title: Professional Career
text:
Self-Employed - Freelance Data Analyst

‚óè Aug 2025 - Current
I am building my freelance career as a Data Analyst, focusing on delivering data-driven insights and interactive solutions for clients. My work primarily involves using R, Shiny, and Tableau to develop dashboards, reports, and analytical tools that transform raw data into actionable information.
Through these projects, I aim to help businesses and individuals improve decision-making, streamline processes, and better understand their data.




Oper - Data Analyst

‚óè Mar 2024 - Aug 2025 (1 year and 5 months)
As a Data Analyst, I collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to analyze large datasets and deliver insights that improved decision-making for clients. I designed and optimized data pipelines to enhance accessibility and processing efficiency, and I created and maintained dozens of interactive dashboards and reports for major national and international clients.
These solutions contributed to more than R$2,500,000 in additional gross profit and supported long-term business growth. Throughout these projects, I worked with a wide range of technologies, including R, Python, SQL, Azure Databricks, PySpark, Excel, and Shiny, to build analyses, reports, dashboards, and ETL pipelines.




Kreativstorm - Data Analyst Trainee

‚óè Aug 2023 - Sep 2023 (2 months)
I collaborated with a diverse team of data analysts and students from around the world on complex case studies analyzing household behavior in the UK. During this experience, I enhanced my proficiency in R and Python by applying theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios, while also improving my spoken and written English through teamwork and presentations, which strengthened my ability to communicate effectively in an international setting.
